title: Riichi Toolbox
cheatsheet.fu.roundup.still20.open: If open hand, then add up to 30 Fu
more.contributeTranslationDesc: Contribute your translation on our Crowdin project!
calculator.whichToDiscard.content: Given a hand of tiles, calculates the optimal discard to maximize your chances of winning.
yaku.tanyao.name: Tanyao
yaku.tanyao.description: Only the tiles 2 through 8 (no 1s, 9s, or honors)
yaku.sanshokudoujun.name: Sanshoku Doujun
yaku.sanshokudoujun.description: The same sequence in each suit
yaku.iipeikou.name: Iipeikou
yaku.iipeikou.description: Two of the exact same sequence
yaku.pinfu.name: Pinfu
yaku.pinfu.description: A hand worth 0 fu. All sequences, with a non-Yakuhai pair and a two sided open wait (23, not 12, 13, or 1234, eg.)
yaku.riichi.name: Riichi
yaku.riichi.description: 1000 point bet. Cannot change hand, discard draws unless you win
yaku.ittsu.name: Ittsu
yaku.ittsu.description: The sequences 123, 456, and 789 in a suit
yaku.daisangen.name: Daisangen
yaku.daisangen.description: A set of each of the three dragons
yaku.ippatsu.name: Ippatsu
yaku.ippatsu.description: Win before your next discard. Calls invalidate
yaku.tsumo.name: Menzen Tsumo
yaku.tsumo.description: Draw your winning tile with a closed hand
yaku.yakuhai.name: Yakuhai
yaku.yakuhai.description: A set (or kan) of value honor tiles (dragons, seat wind, prevalent wind). Score for each set
yaku.honitsu.name: Honitsu
yaku.toitoi.name: Toitoi
yaku.chiitoitsu.name: Chiitoitsu
yaku.chanta.name: Chanta
yaku.chanta.description: All groups contain a 1, 9, or honor
yaku.chinitsu.name: Chinitsu
yaku.sanankou.name: Sanankou
yaku.sanankou.description: Three concealed triplets. The rest of the hand may be open
yaku.haitei.name: Haitei
yaku.haitei.description: Tsumo on the last draw from the wall
yaku.houtei.name: Houtei
yaku.houtei.description: Ron on the last discard from the wall
yaku.doubleRiichi.name: Double Riichi
yaku.doubleRiichi.description: Declare on your ﬁrst discard. Calls invalidate
yaku.junchan.name: Junchan
yaku.junchan.description: All groups contain a 1 or 9. (no honors)
yaku.shousangen.name: Shousangen
yaku.shousangen.description: Two sets and a pair of each dragon
yaku.rinshan.name: Rinshan
yaku.rinshan.description: Win on the dead wall draw after calling kan
yaku.honroutou.name: Honroutou
yaku.chankan.name: Chankan
yaku.chankan.description: Win oﬀ a player upgrading a called triplet to a kan
yaku.ryanpeikou.name: Ryanpeikou
yaku.sanshokudoukou.name: Sanshoku Doukou
yaku.sanshokudoukou.description: The same triplet in each suit
yaku.sankantsu.name: Sankantsu
yaku.nagashiMangan.name: Nagashi Mangan
yaku.nagashiMangan.description: At the end, discarded only 1s, 9s, and honors, with none called
yaku.suukantsu.name: Suukantsu
yaku.koukushi.name: Koukushi Musou
yaku.koukushi.description: Each terminal and honor and a pair
yaku.koukushi13.name: Koukushi Musou 13-wait
yaku.suuankou.name: Suuankou
yaku.suuankouTanki.name: Suuankou Tanki
yaku.suuankouTanki.description: Suuankou waiting to make a pair
yaku.chinroutou.name: Chinroutou
yaku.shousuushi.name: Shousuushi
yaku.shousuushi.description: Three sets and a pair of each wind
yaku.daisuushi.name: Daisuushi
yaku.daisuushi.description: A set of each of the four winds
yaku.tsuuiisou.name: Tsuuiisou
yaku.ryuuiisou.name: Ryuuiisou
yaku.ryuuiisou.description: A hand consisting of only green tiles
yaku.chuuren.name: Chuuren Poutou
yaku.chuuren.description: 1112345678999 in one suit and an extra tile of that suit
yaku.chuuren9.name: Junsei Chuuren Poutou
yaku.tenhou.name: Tenhou
yaku.tenhou.description: Win on your opening hand or ﬁrst draw. Calls invalidate (Oya)
yaku.chiihou.name: Chiihou
yaku.chiihou.description: Win on your opening hand or ﬁrst draw. Calls invalidate (Ko)
